ygData.subject: Re: Humble youth seeking enlightenemt
ygData.msgSnippet: 1.  when your skill quits going up :)  most skills are 5 points per level. 2.  6th lvl, nothing in najena for you, Befallen is on the south side of W commons.
ygData.messageBody:
1. when your skill quits going up :) most skills are 5 points per level.
2. 6th lvl, nothing in najena for you, Befallen is on the south side of W commons.
3. depending on the crouds befallen can be good, or group up and hunt big bugs in commons or n ro.
4. divided among party members depending upon their level and race/class
5. why raise int?
6. supposidly they were going to put one in, but do not know.

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan

>>> <AzerothJS@...> 5.18.99 4:52:45 PM >>>
From: AzerothJS@...

I hope you kind sirs will pardon the unspeakable ignorance of a young lad
such as myself. I have seven questions:

1. How do you know when you are maxed at a skill?

2. Where are Najena and Befallen?

3. What should a level six Barbarian be doing with his limited amounts of
time?

4. How is experience divided in a group? Is it the same amout as solo, split
into shares, or is there more total experience given out?

5. Are there any items I can get on Tunare to raise my intelligence?

6. Are there any quests to become non-PvP?

You have my deepest gratitude in advance for any information.

Rocjaw,
Son of Halas
